nodes.text: "Road to Mandalore" was a song authored and performed by the band Red Shift Limit. Referencing the planet Mandalore in its title, the song was featured on the band's compilation album Thoughts from the Core. Officially banned by the Imperial Board of Culture for its anti-Imperial content, the album was available in the galaxy by the time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY.

"Road to Mandalore" was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a guide intended for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game system. Galaxy Guide 9 was written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann and was published in 1993.
